alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 09 at 4:20AM PST until December 09 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter of a mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...Eastern Curry County and Josephine County and Jackson County, including portions of Highway 199 in the Illinois Valley near Cave Junction, Highway 238 in the Applegate Valley near Williams and Ruch and the Rogue Valley, including I-5 and Highways 62, 234 and 140 near Medford, Central Point, Phoenix, Eagle Point and Shady Cove. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential slick spots due to frost on area bridges and roads. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * If possible, wait for temperatures to warm above freezing before traveling. * Slow down and give 3 times as much space as normal between vehicles. * Shaded areas may be more slippery than unshaded areas. * Use low beams. High beams reflect back fog making visibility worse for you and other drivers.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County
